Topic.Title: Scientific Proof the Swearing Reduces Pain

Posts.EditableText:
They finally have scientific proof that swearing reduces pain.
I thought some of you might be interested in this article.
https://www.wired.com/story/the-science-of-why-swearing-physically-reduces-pain/
P.S. In case you are confused, there are different definitions of arousal. But they are talking about adrenaline.

Posts.EditableText:
(filler for getting edited post, updated/posted)

---------------------------

"emotions" (swearing/sadness/shock-surprise-trauma/fear-nervousness-anxiousness/bravery-courage/rage-anger/hate/love/happiness-joy/values-ideals: justice-vengence-fairness-equality-etc/adrenaline:preparation-for-surviving-handling-a-threat/etc is/are just a symptom/response of emotions: aka, "emotions" are the 'keys' to starting up the "body's survival response" 'car') and "pain" (warning of survival/threat/harm/danger) and etc, are just chemical and/or electrical signals within the body to-and-from brain to whatever other part of the body involved.

this has been known for a long time already... but we got retards who love wasting money on stuff that we already know/proven... sighs...

---------------

an angry person has adrenaline coursing through his/her body, causing all of his body functions and senses to be heightened ("super human"), to give him/her the best chance of reacting-to and surviving the threat to him/her. Anger/rage/hate is always lawful as it's a self-defense mechanism, a RE-action/RE-sponse to a threat upon you, it is the main 'key' to turning on your body's survival/protection mode 'car'.

An angry/enraged/hateful/sad/etc (due to adrenaline) or whatever other emotional state (and whatever other chems/electricals) person is: smarter, faster physically and mentally (able to think better and faster), better hearing, better analyzing, stronger, and etc than a non-angry or non-emotional person. An emotional person is in a super human state. Everything is enhanced, every physical aspect of the body, intelligence and mental and logic and reasonsing of the brain, and every sense (sight, hearing, taste, smelling, touching) as well, and also thus totally 100% focused with no distractions, your full and undivided attention, your entire body and brain and mind and senses and everything is fully devoted/directed, on/upon the threat. An emotional person is more "in-tune" with the world, him/her-self, and others and/or the issue/conflict/problem/etc (the threat), than a non-emotional person ever is or could be.

--------

P.S.

also on swearing (aside from causing emotional state and thus chemical/electrical release)... it's also just a means of distraction (you're concentrating on something else), you can get the same effect if you say anything, have a conversation with someone, or do whatever else. you just need to distract yourself, so you're not focused on/upon the pain signals or whatever. Doctors do this when they got to set a broken bone: "on the count of 3... 1..."... ach! ouch!... "all done, bone is set back in its socket!"... "hey... I thought you said on the count of 3!!!!"). Or, If needles/shots bother you, just look away, relax (so the needle/shot can easily pierce your skin as you don't have hardened muscle in the way) and distract yourself with/on something else, and you won't even notice/feel the needle/shot and the pain, at all, hehe.
